ygData.subject: Sliding problems

ygData.messageBody:
I had big problems last night with my movement keys. I use a lot of "slide
left" and "slide right" movement in battle (old Doom/Quake habit). However,
I noticed now that when I press the "shift" key to slide, it locks me in
the same direction of movement (if I were turning then I start spinning).

I sent a bug report in last night, and even submitted a petition. Was
surprised a guide contacted me (since I said that this was a low priority
in the grand scheme of things) and he told me to try to press my right
mouse button to slide. I tried this, even though I usually use my right
hand for the movement keys, but it didn't work. He didn't have any idea
what I could try to fix, since I mentioned I even tried remapping the
history commands to different keys.

He suggested I wipe my opt files, but I just did that last week, so
everything is pretty clean. So I submitted a bug.

Has anyone else had similar problems and if so, anyone figure a way to fix it?

---Windleaf
